changeSet.author: rafal.kalita@hmcts.net
changeSet.sql: UPDATE complex_field Set field_type_id = (SELECT id from field_type WHERE field_type.reference = 'DynamicList' and version = 1 and jurisdiction_id is null) WHERE reference = 'CaseRoleId' AND complex_field_type_id = (select id from field_type where reference = 'ChangeOrganisationRequest' and version = 1 and jurisdiction_id is null);
